import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function () { const { id } = useParams(); const fetchProduct = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/${id}`); return response.data.product; } catch (error) { throw new Error("Network response was not ok"); } }; const [editpage, seteditpage] = useState(false); const [deletePage, setdeletePage] = useState(false); const { data: product, isLoading, error, refetch, } = useQuery("product", fetchProduct); const handleRefetch = () => { refetch(); }; if (isLoading) return
